Title: Pizza
Description: a dish made typically of flattened bread dough spread with a savory mixture

Title: Chole
Description: Chole masala is a popular Punjabi dish where chickpeas are simmered in a spicy & tangy gravy.

Title: Cheesy Vada Pav
Description: Vada pao, is a vegetarian fast food dish native to the state of Maharashtra.

Title: Chicken Nuggets
Description: A chicken nugget is a food product consisting of a small piece of deboned chicken meat that is breaded or battered, then deep-fried or baked

Title: Gulab Jamun
Description: Gulab jamun is an Indian dessert of fried dough balls that are soaked in a sweet, sticky sugar syrup.

Title: Momos
Description: It's a north-Indian dish. It varies according to the taste all over India.

Title: Idli
Description: Idli Sambar is a hearty, satisfying, comforting and a healthy meal of soft fluffy idlis served with savory, spiced and lightly tangy sambar

Title: Pav Bhaji
Description: Pav bhaji is a fast food dish from India consisting of a thick vegetable curry served with a soft bread roll
